Talon:

"Dont do an excessive effort" said Talon "We dont know what that wo=
rm can do with her vemon" she opened a com link and said"Lord Persus, i nee=
d to speak with you... in private"


From: Sandy 
Sent: Friday, January 15,=
 2010 8:52 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: The Old Maximal Base=
/Unicron's come back


  
Tucson could not help but smile at Talon's comple=
ment. Even though his damages caused him slight pain, he did not want to co=
me across as a bot with a low tolerance. The more he sat there, the more he=
 began to get in touch with his sociable side. He could sense where Talon w=
as, and is sure to put a gentile hand on her shoulder.

" Well, if it hadn'=
t been for Kup's training, I don't think I'd be as skilled as I am. I sure =
do miss him. I can't remember much about what really happened and how I got=
 separated from the other Autobots. I know I was hit, and I got severely da=
maged by an unexpected blow to my processor.. I wish I could remember where=
 that blast came from and who it was from." 

He tries to get up but weakne=
ss takes its toll on him.

"Ughhh, yeah, that hit definitely took a lot out=
 of me. Tell Lord Perseus that I'm going to need a little road side assista=
nce. Let's see. I - think it's best that I try to transform, that way, it's=
 easier to wheel me out of here. 

Slowly he manages to transform into his =
vehicle mode and barely makes it as several metal plates shift with a bit o=
f a lag.

" That's - better. Kup - warned me there'd be - days like this."
=

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:

> "Underst=
ood, let's set up shop in the command center. I don't like these

ignals, we need to fortify." Replied Perseus. "Is the landing zone

 Is anyone injured?"
> 
> The radio clicked.
> 
> "Command center is still =
secure. We still have our maximal friend here in
> stasis. Also someone nee=
ds to take a peek at the reactor and see if we can
> get power running. Thi=
s base is a lot larger than our old one, other

or us down there."
> 
> Click.
>

quartz@...> wrote:

> Tucson falls to the ground, and sits up against a w=
all. Lamia's attacks did
> take a slight toll on him.
> 
> " Wow, I'd defin=
itely would not recommend that anyone tries this at home.
> I'm - all right=
, I think. My neck and my foot will need some repair work,
> other than tha=
t.. Ughhh, oh yeah, theres this venom that Lamia got me
> with... I- manage=
d to neutralize the greater effects although, I don't
> think I got all of =
it. But - for now, danger averted."
> 
> He tries to direct an ear toward T=
alon.
> 
> "Talon, thank you for putting up with me. I know it's not easy w=
orking with
> a bot who thinks outside the box."
> 
> He sends a message ba=
ck to Lord Perseus.
> 
> "Lord Perseus, I'm pleased to inform you that alth=
ough one minion has
> escaped we have managed to capture Nightstrike and wi=
ll be bringing him
> aboard for questioning. I'd like permission to questio=
n him personally."
